Header.title: We are Legadax
Header.paragraph: We are a team of designers and developers that create good looking and stunning work

About.paragraph: We are Legadax. A group of cells that made up a human called Legadax. We offer creative and flexible designs for a good and fair price. Our MOTTO is to feel the happiness of our customer before ours

Services.name: WordPress designs
Services.text: We can create good wordpress sites and blogs for you with custom features

Services.name: E-commerce
Services.text: Want to have an online store. Creating an online store and integrating payment services has never been so easy
